title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4404.13 - Interface agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4404.13 - Interface agreements

State Regulations

Each agreement for the combination of all off-track
wagers with on-track wagers between a State track or an out-of-state track and
a corporation shall be subject to the prior approval of the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4404.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
